Package org.apache.wiki.event

Interface WikiEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
GroupManager, PageManager, ReferenceManager, RenderingManager, SearchManager, Session, WorkflowManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAdminBeanManager, DefaultGroupManager, DefaultPageManager, DefaultReferenceManager, DefaultRenderingManager, DefaultSearchManager, DefaultWorkflowManager, PageViewPlugin.PageViewManager, RSSThread, WikiBackgroundThread, WikiSession
public interface WikiEventListener
extends java.util.EventListener
Defines an interface for an object that listens for WikiEvents.
Since:
2.3.92

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionPerformed​(WikiEvent event)
    Fired when a WikiEvent is triggered by an event source.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      void actionPerformed​(WikiEvent event)
      Fired when a WikiEvent is triggered by an event source.
      Parameters:
      event - a WikiEvent object
